meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7648.

td.p: Eric Dravland, a pediatrician from Lenoir, North Carolina
Lindsay Norsworthy, a small business owner from Linthicum Heights, Maryland
Kyle Becker, a research scientist from Nashville, Tennessee (whose 2-day cash winnings total $30,400)

tr.td: THEY MADE THE CABINET
NATIONAL DAYS
PUT A "LID" ON IT
THE EYE
OF THE TIGER
YOU'RE GONNA HEAR ME ROAR
